thread.title: Photos of the Day: The Harting Roadshow Tour Visits MDT
thread.title_full: Photos of the Day: The Harting Roadshow Tour Visits MDT

title: Photos of the Day: The Harting Roadshow Tour Visits MDT
text:
Harting has put together a rolling " roadshow " to showcase its connectivity solutions right at a customer's front door...literally! Along their route, they managed to make a detour to the home base of Advantage Business Media and the MDT and ECN brands to allow several members of the teams to check out what the company was showcasing. I was sure to take some pictures of the experience.
The outside simply looked like a delivery truck of sorts. Inside was an entirely different offering. MDT's associate editor Sam Brusco reviews one of several displays within the truck. Lots of options and lots of very different connector technologies. Another display within the roadshow The "lower" displays were in drawers that could be slid out so you could touch the components to really get an idea of weight, design, or other factors. Real-time digital reporter Megan Crouse checks out one of the interactive displays. Regional director of sales Stacey Morris watches a video on another interactive display. Sam reviews a white paper on still another display... ...and then gets more information on a particular product. Regional director of sales Pat Venezia configures a connector for a project he's working on...apparently.
